name: Boy Loves Girl
description:
Follow a young boy’s journey as he encounters one of life’s greatest mysteries . . . how to please a woman. 

Embark on an epic adventure across vast lands in search for the ultimate gift to express your love for the girl your heart desires. 

Find the world’s most treasured gift: chase gazelles, kangaroos, baby elephants and all the cute creatures that grace the lands, save the rare and precious stars in the sky and even carry the moon on a string!

*****

CONTROLS

Swipe up and down to fly the moon.
Avoid clouds at all costs!
Don't forget to collect the happy smiles.
Good luck!

*****

* Epic Story Adventure
* Crisp Retina Graphics
* Universal App
* Game Center Leaderboards
* Game Center Achievements
* Hours upon Hours of Gameplay
* Beautifully Animated Characters
* Seven Wonderful Worlds
* More than 50 Lovable Levels
* Over 100 Charming Challenges
* Stacks of Secret Bonuses
* and Millions of Smiles to Collect
